content.html: Oldie resides in Denver making cool shit across the spectrum of art. With an eye for photography and a heart for multimedia, she's always saving bits and pieces of moments and the world around for a new piece. A student of LungA, where she explored statue and whale bones and the power of painting all over your walls, focusing on the political and the punk, the pretty and the personal. A believer in wearing what you make, and taking pictures with your friends, Oldie's been doin this for a while and has no plan to stop now. — JT Wright (a friend)

A believer in wearing what you make, and taking pictures with your friends, Oldie's been doin this for a while and has no plan to stop now. — JT Wright (a friend)

body.html: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.
body.markdown: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.

body.html: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
